statements: SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders;
SELECT * FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT order_id, customer_name FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id FROM Orders;
SELECT order_date, order_id FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date FROM Shipments;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, shipment_id, shipment_date FROM Orders JOIN Shipments ON Orders.order_id = Shipments.order_id;
SELECT MAX(order_date) AS latest_order_date FROM Orders;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS unique_customers FROM Orders;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE order_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT shipment_date, delivery_address FROM Shipments ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT return_reason FROM Returns WHERE return_status = 'pending';
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' AND total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM Orders JOIN Shipments ON Orders.order_id = Shipments.order_id WHERE shipment_status = 'Delivered';

SELECT customer_name, order_date, shipment_date, delivery_address FROM Orders JOIN Shipments ON Orders.order_id = Shipments.order_id JOIN Returns ON Shipments.order_id = Returns.order_id WHERE Returns.return_status = 'Approved';
SELECT order_id, return_reason, return_date FROM Orders JOIN Returns ON Orders.order_id = Returns.order_id WHERE return_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT return_id, return_reason FROM returns WHERE order_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000);
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC, total_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders JOIN shipments ON orders.order_id = shipments.order_id WHERE shipments.shipment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.order_date, products.product_name FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.total_amount > products.product_price;
SELECT orders.order_id, shipments.shipment_date, returns.return_reason FROM orders LEFT JOIN shipments ON orders.order_id = shipments.order_id LEFT JOIN returns ON orders.order_id = returns.order_id;
SELECT orders.order_id, products.product_name, products.product_price FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.order_id = products.product_id WHERE products.product_price < 50;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 200;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT order_id, shipment_status, shipment_date FROM shipments WHERE shipment_status = 'Shipped';
